title: Gigi Hadid sports chic and sheer maroon blouse with matching trousers between meetings in New York
text:
She's used to sashaying along runways for the top designers.

And Gigi Hadid looked ready to storm the catwalk while out and about in New York City on Saturday afternoon.

The 24-year-old supermodel showed off her cleavage in a low-cut purple bra that she wore under a long-sleeved, see-through, chiffon top of a similar hue.

Sheer style: Gigi Hadid showed off her cleavage in a low-cut purple bra that she wore under a long-sleeved, see-through, chiffon top of a similar hue in Soho, NYC, on Saturday

Gigi flaunted her fall fashion sense in the monochrome ensemble as she pounded the pavement to a waiting vehicle.

She tucked it into her light purple, high-waist pants that showed off her incredibly slender physique.

The beautiful blonde, who smoothed her tresses back into high pony tail, wore high-heeled, cream. snakeskin print bootees.

So chic: The 24-year-old model teamed the top with high-waist maroon pants

In a blingy mood: Gigi wore two heavy gold chain necklaces and a pendent on a thin gold chain, plus trendy gold hoop earrings and large rings on her fingers

Gigi was evidently in a blingy mood as she wore two heavy gold chain necklaces and a pendent on a thin gold chain, plus trendy gold hoop earrings and large rings on her fingers.

Oblong shades protected her eyes from the bright sunlight even though showers were in the weather forecast for the area.

Meanwhile, Gigi recently split with Bachelor vet Tyler Cameron, 26, after dating for just three months.

Ssssizzling style: The model donned a pair of cream, snakeskin, high-heeled bootees

He revealed that the pair are still good pals in a chat with Us Weekly at the grand opening of the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida, on Thursday.

The general contractor and part-time model dished that he and Gigi, 24, are 'friends' and they're in touch 'when we need to be.'

Gigi may not feel quite the same way as she was spotted leaving a photoshoot the same day in a sweatshirt that read, pointedly, 'Boys Lie, Goodbye.'
description: The 24-year-old showed off her cleavage in a low-cut purple bra that she wore under a long-sleeved, see-through chiffon top of a similar hue plus high waist pants on Saturday.
